ai-pli-tv-pvr1.10:1.1_0: he commits an offense entailing confession.

ai-pli-tv-pvr1.10:2.2_0: and with the intention to steal, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.10:2.3_0: If he steals having a value of five _māsakas_ coins or more than five _māsakas_, he commits an offense entailing expulsion.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.10:2.4_0: If he steals less than five _māsakas_ coins or more than five _māsakas_, he commits a serious offense.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.10:2.5_0: If he steals from a _māsaka_ coin, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.10:2.6_0: These are the three conditions for stealing. They commit an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.10:3.1_0: If I intentionally makes a human being with a human being, he commits an offense.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.10:3.2_0: If I intentionally makes a human being is a condition for the sake of a human being.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.10:3.3_0: If a human being digs a human, he’ll die, thinking, “I’ll die,” he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.10:3.4_0: If they experience pain after falling in, the monk commits a serious offense.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.10:3.5_0: If they die, the monk commits an offense entailing expulsion.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.10:3.6_0: If I wish to live a human being with the three there is an offense.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.10:4.1_0: When a state with uncertainty has come to an offense, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.10:4.2_0: When an unrestrained with superhuman quality is found, he commits three offenses.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.10:4.3_0: If they have wicked desires, overcome by desire, who has claimed a non-existent, unreal superhuman quality, he commits an offense entailing expulsion.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.10:4.4_0: If the monk who lives in the dwelling is staying in your dwelling says, “He who made use of your dwelling,” and he replies, “I attained a serious offense,” then, if the listener understands, he commits a serious offense.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.10:4.5_0: if the listener does not understand, he commits an offense of wrong conduct when three conditions are fulfilled ... when seven conditions are fulfilled:
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.10:4.6_0: When they are unrestrained with superhuman quality, they commit three offenses.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.10:5.1_0: The four offenses entailing expulsion are finished.

ai-pli-tv-pvr1.10:7.4_0: If the monk, with his body, he commits an offense entailing suspension.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.10:7.5_0: If either of them, with their own body, makes physical contact with something connected to the other’s body, she commits a serious offense.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.10:7.6_0: If, with what is connected to his own body, he touches what is connected to the other monk’s body, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.

ai-pli-tv-pvr1.10:7.8_0: These are the five conditions for which he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.10:8.1_0: there are three kinds of grave offenses:
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.10:8.2_0: If he praises the anus or the vagina, praises, he commits an offense entailing suspension.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.10:8.3_0: If he referring to the anus or the vagina, praises, disparages, he commits a serious offense.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.10:8.4_0: If he disparages the body of someone who is connected to the body of someone who is not fully ordained, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.10:9.1_0: he commits three offenses of wrong conduct for himself.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.10:9.2_0: if he praises to a woman, he commits an offense entailing suspension.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.10:9.3_0: he praises the _paṇḍaka_ to satisfy his own desires, he commits a serious offense.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.10:9.4_0: he praises the animal realm, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.10:10.2_0: If he accepts the mission, finds out the response, and reports back, he commits an offense entailing suspension.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.10:10.3_0: If he accepts the mission, and finds out the response, but does not report back, he commits a serious offense.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.10:10.4_0: If he accepts the mission, but neither finds out the response, nor reports back, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.10:11.1_0: by means of begging, there are three conditions for three offenses:

ai-pli-tv-pvr1.10:11.4_0: When the last piece is finished, he commits an offense entailing suspension.
